title: How is 5G used to manipulate us? - Quora

response.answer_text: 5G is offering amazing performance and telcos will be pushing expensive phone upgrades and service plans. You can expect heavy marketing pressure to spend more money on cellular service, and marketeers are very good at manipulating people to buy in. If you were expecting something more nefarious than a company trying to get more money from customers, you’re paying too much attention to conspiracy floggers and fear-mongers.  Question as posted: How is 5G used to manipulate us?

Not sure since it is not really available as much more than a concept in most regions of the world. But it is clear it has already altered human behavior as mass efforts by groups unknown to cast shade on 5G before its ever deployed, indicate.
